overview: Steve Aragon has more than 20 years of experience in thin film materials, processes, and systems. He previously worked as the VP of Engineering at Daystar Technologies, a publicly traded manufacturer of thin film CIGS cells and modules. Steve also served as Program Manager of DC Plasma Power Products at Advanced Energy and in a variety of process engineering and process application roles with SciVac/Optcom and Intevac Systems. Steve holds his PhD in Physical Chemistry from the University of California, an MBA in Finance from Santa Clara University, an MS in Chemistry from the University of California, and a BA in Chemistry from the University of Northern Colorado.
